name: Virus Hunter (Electrichazard)
description: For this short vr experience, you will travel through a short segment of a vein trying to remove all the virus spawns.  They are also infecting anything that gets close to them.  You move through the level using the thumbsticks pushing forward and back to fly.  The red blood cells will help you.  If you grab one and hold it for three seconds, it becomes charged with protection from your suit.  It will be protected from the virus and can also block incoming projectiles from the virus.
